entry.title: At least 17 states report coronavirus cases at colleges

media:group.media:description:
CNN's Nick Watt reports 17 states are reporting coronavirus outbreaks on college campuses, specifically putting Greek life in the spotlight.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Steve Bannon charged with fraud in border wall fundraising

media:group.media:title: Steve Bannon charged with fraud in border wall fundraising
media:group.media:description:
Federal prosecutors charged Steve Bannon, President Donald Trump's former campaign adviser, and three others with defrauding donors of hundreds of thousands of dollars in a border wall fundraising campaign. Bannon has been arrested, according to a spokesman for the US attorney's office. Bannon's lawyer did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Why Donald Trump thinks he deserves a third term

media:group.media:title: Why Donald Trump thinks he deserves a third term
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump hasn't even been reelected to a second term, and he is already thinking about a third. While serving three terms is Constitutionally banned, Chris Cillizza explains how this narrative falls into a bigger picture about Trump's legacy.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Believe it or not, Donald Trump says he should get a third term https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/18/politics/donald-trump-third-term-2024/index.html
Trump Says Heâ€™ll Seek a Third Term Because â€˜They Spied On Meâ€™ https://www.yahoo.com/entertainment/trump-says-ll-seek-third-000717298.html
Bipartisan Senate report details Trump campaign contacts with Russia in 2016, adding to Mueller findings https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/18/politics/senate-intelligence-report-russia-election-interference-efforts/index.html
G.O.P.-Led Senate Panel Details Ties Between 2016 Trump Campaign and Russia https://www.nytimes.com/2020/08/18/us/politics/senate-intelligence-russian-interference-report.html?referringSource=articleShare
What today's guilty plea in the Russia probe shows (and what it doesn't) https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/14/politics/clinesmith-fbi-russia-mueller-trump/index.html
Trump Claims He Was Joking When He Very Seriously Asked About Injecting Disinfectants and UV Light https://www.thedailybeast.com/trump-says-he-was-joking-when-he-asked-about-injecting-disinfectants-and-uv-light-to-treat-virus
The fight to be Trump's political heir is on https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/09/politics/trump-heir-2024-contenders-cotton-hawley-pence-ivanka-don-jr/index.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out whatâ€™s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #President Trump

entry.title: Ex-Trump official shares his prediction if Trump loses 2020

media:group.media:title: Ex-Trump official shares his prediction if Trump loses 2020
media:group.media:description: Former senior Trump administration official Miles Taylor says he is concerned that President Donald Trump will use litigation to make the 2020 race difficult for electors to certify. #CNN #News

entry.title: While Obama gave his DNC speech, Trump sent hate tweets

media:group.media:title: While Obama gave his DNC speech, Trump sent hate tweets
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Watch Obama at the DNC: Trump uses the office for himself

media:group.media:title: Watch Obama at the DNC: Trump uses the office for himself
media:group.media:description:
Want more of the latest 2020 election videos? Watch here: https://cnn.it/3iM1ESH Former President Barack Obama used his speech at the 2020 Democratic National Convention to draw a contrast between Democratic Presidential nominee Joe Biden and President Donald Trump, saying that Trump is not a good custodian of democracy because he uses his position for personal gain instead of working for all Americans.
#Obama #DNC #CNN
